original_data.Title: Introduction to Python Programming
original_data.Short Intro: Learn to solve practical problems with Python.
original_data.Prequisites: This course is ideal for students who are new to Python, but have some experience programming in another language. If you're a complete beginner to programming, we recommend checking out the Learn to Code program, which will help you understand how code is used all over the web.  See the Technology Requirements for using Udacity.

unified_data.title: Introduction to Python Programming
unified_data.description: Learn to solve practical problems with Python.
learning_outcomes: Understand the fundamentals of Python programming.
Write conditional expressions and control program flow using if statements and loops.
Create and utilize functions for code modularity and reusability.
Represent and manipulate data using Python's data types and operators.
Apply whitespace and style guidelines for readable and maintainable code.
